SummaryEnglish: Kato, Shimura, Arai, Nakamoto, and Takagi are friends. They are going to Seiryuu Gakuen High school, which is a boy's boarding school. One day when the school festival is close at hand, the president of the student government invites them for dinner. However it is his plot to force them to play in a drama at the school festival.
SummaryJapanese:
For Nakamoto, Arai, Shimura, Katoh and Takagi, graduation from the Seiryu Academy for boys can't arrive soon enough! With preparations being made for the end of the year festivities, the gang is presented with an opportunity they can't refuse from President Kusanagi himself -- to perform in a special play for all the students! The only catch? The title of the play to be performed by these three manly men is... Little Women?!

Based on the manga of the same name, written by Kei Arisugawa and published by Kadokawa Shoten.
